question: Bhagwati Sutra gives the valuable information about the life of which of the following?
explanation: Bhagavati Sutra, is the fifth of the 12 Jain Agamas. It said to be promulgated by Mahavira. The Bhagavati Sutra is said to have been composed by Sudharmaswami by the Svetambara school of Jainism.
